data.title: Andy Roberts - Group CEO at Sabio
data.meta_description: Andy Roberts has a diverse work experience spanning over several years. Andy is currently the Group CEO at Sabio, a position they assumed in March 2023.
data.text:
Andy Roberts has a diverse work experience spanning over several years. Andy is currently the Group CEO at Sabio, a position they assumed in March 2023. Prior to this role, they served as the Vice Chairman from December 2019 to April 2023. From July 2016 to December 2019, they were the Group CEO at Sabio.

Before joining Sabio, Andy held various positions within the company, including Pre-sales, Solution Delivery and Support Director from October 2013 to June 2016, where they were responsible for pre-sales, solutions delivery, and managed services/support for both UK and international operations. Andy also served as the Practices and Marketing Director from October 2010 to September 2013, overseeing the development and direction of five integrated business practices within Sabio.

Prior to Sabio, Andy worked at Lloyds TSB as a Branch Director from March 2000 to October 2001 and as a Senior Manager from January 1999 to March 2000. Andy also worked as a Financial Planning Consultant - Business Banking at Lloyds Bank from June 1993 to March 1997 and as a Personal Banking - Financial Advisor from January 1992 to June 1993. Andy started their career at Lloyds Bank in various positions from September 1989 to March 1992.

In addition to their roles at Sabio and Lloyds, Andy also served as a Field Sales Manager at Black Horse Financial Services from March 1997 to January 1999. Currently, they are also a Non-Executive Director at Modern Networks, a position they assumed in April 2021.

Andy Roberts attended Queen Mary University of London from 1986 to 1989, where they pursued a Bachelor of Science degree in Economics.
